name: Bullet Shed
description:
Bullet Shed is a Game Boy themed bullet hell made in Unity by a single developer (Me). Shoot through waves of enemies, get destroyed, or go bankrupt by spending all your money in the upgrade shop! (Not yet available :/) There are currently 30 waves each getting progressively harder. Hey, there might even be some easter eggs.

Music by:

Pix

Marllon Silva (xDeviruchi

RoccoW
